Name: Toy Killer
About the game: Zombies take the island. You! Come to the city, find new weapons, and kill a maximum of them to get the higher score. This game is solo-player third person shooter where you start in a city infected by zombies. Your first weapon is a handgun but you will find new ones like a shotgun or a machine gun to kill more zombies and stay alive. The game ends when you get killed. The score is determined by the number of kills and the period of time during which youâ€™re alive. Get the higher score!
